Package blackjack

Class PlayerHand

java.lang.Object
blackjack.Hand
blackjack.PlayerHand
public class PlayerHand
extends Hand
Class relative to a usable hand by a player.

Extends a regular Hand

      public PlayerHand​(int bet_in, boolean opening, boolean split)
      Creates a usable Hand for the player.
      Parameters:
      bet_in - Bet that is placed at the beginning.
      opening - if it is an opening hand
      split - Checks for a split.
